bug.author: pichonz
bug.description: It would be great if there was a section in the tensorflow.org website where the community could provide tutorials for new users. There are a lot of great tutorials in the web and having some on the tensorflow.org website would be very valuable for people just starting out. Thoughts? Here is an example of what I would love to share: <denchmark-link:https://bitbucket.org/hrojas/learn-tensorflow>https://bitbucket.org/hrojas/learn-tensorflow</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wolffg>@wolffg</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/martinwicke>@martinwicke</denchmark-link> , is there a good place on devsite for adding these?

Please add them to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/resources/index.md>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/resources/index.md</denchmark-link>
This is less prominent than we'd like at the moment, but whatever new place will be seeded with information from there.
